item.title: 加拿大紧急召集OpenAI安全团队赴渥太华进行磋商
item.description: 加拿大人工智能部长埃文·所罗门周一告诉记者，在发现OpenAI公司未就某位后来实施校园枪击案的嫌疑人分享内部担忧后，加拿大已紧急召见该公司高管赴渥太华进行磋商。【原文：Canada has summoned top officials from OpenAI to Ottawa for urgent talks after it emerged the company had not shared internal concerns about a person who went on to commit a school shooting, Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon told reporters on Monday.】

item.title: C.H.罗宾逊首席执行官表示人工智能将推动货运经纪行业整合
item.description: 全球物流服务商C.H.罗宾逊公司首席执行官戴夫·博兹曼驳斥了近期因人工智能引发的货运行业动荡所导致的抛售潮，并表示技术应用竞赛反而会推动行业整合。【原文：Global logistics provider C.H. Robinson's CEO Dave Bozeman dismissed a recent selloff tied to AI-led disruption in the freight industry, and said the race to adopt the technology would spur consolidation instead.】

item.title: Anthropic称中国公司利用Claude改进自家模型
item.description: 聊天机器人克劳德的开发公司Anthropic周一在博客中称，三家中国公司曾试图利用克劳德不当获取能力以改进其自身模型。【原文：Three Chinese companies have tried to use Claude to improperly obtain capabilities to improve their own models, the chatbot's creator Anthropic said in a blog post on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约联储通胀指标12月升温
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的指标，12月份潜在通胀水平升温，这表明要使整体价格压力回归美国央行2%的目标仍面临更多挑战。【原文：The underlying level of inflation heated up in December as measured by a New York Federal Reserve gauge, suggesting further challenges in getting overall price pressures back to the U.S. central bank's 2% target.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻报道，花旗集团即将向包括黑石集团在内的投资者集团出售Banamex股权。
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士报道，花旗集团即将达成协议，将其墨西哥零售银行Banamex金融集团24%的股权出售给包括黑石集团在内的一组投资者。【原文：Citigroup is nearing a deal to sell a 24% stake in its Mexican retail bank Grupo Financiero Banamex to a group of investors that includes Blackstone , Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税引发更多不确定性，这些股票值得关注
item.description: 关税不确定性再度浮现，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普宣布将对部分商品加征15%的关税，而上周美国最高法院刚刚裁定其更广泛的关税措施无效。【原文：Tariff uncertainty is back after U.S. President Donald Trump announced a new 15% duty following a Supreme Court ruling that struck down his broader levies last week.】

item.title: 艾伯维将投资3.8亿美元扩大伊利诺伊州美国生产基地
item.description: 艾伯维公司周一宣布，将投资3.8亿美元在其伊利诺伊州园区新建两座活性药物成分生产设施，以扩大其神经科学和肥胖症药物的国内生产能力。【原文：AbbVie on Monday said it would invest $380 million to build two new active pharmaceutical ingredient manufacturing facilities at its Illinois campus, expanding its domestic production capacity for its neuroscience and obesity medicines.】

item.title: 安吉公司计划在巴西大型新建太阳能电站中部署比特币矿场及存储系统
item.description: 法国能源公司Engie巴西负责人表示，该公司正考虑在其新建的巴西太阳能电站安装储能系统或比特币挖矿数据中心，以提升该设施的盈利能力。【原文：Engie is looking at installing storage systems or bitcoin mining data centers at its new solar plant in Brazil to make the facility more profitable, the local head of the French utility company said.】

item.title: Facetune开发商Lightricks将拆分为两个部门，因AI高端软件发展速度超越传统软件
item.description: 据路透社获得的一份内部备忘录显示，照片编辑应用Facetune的开发商Lightricks正将其消费级应用业务与生成式人工智能视频平台LTX分拆，此举旨在更好地把握人工智能带来的增长机遇，该技术正重塑传统软件行业格局。【原文：The creator of the Facetune photo editing app, Lightricks, is splitting its consumer app business from its generative AI video platform LTX, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters, better positioning itself to capture the growth in artificial intelligence as it reshapes traditional software businesses.】

item.title: Meta用户调查发现，19%的青少年Instagram用户表示曾看到过不想要的裸体图片。
item.description: 根据法庭文件显示，近五分之一的13至15岁用户向Meta公司反映，他们在Instagram上看到了不愿观看的"裸露或色情图片"。【原文：Nearly 1 in 5 users aged 13 to 15 told Meta that they saw “nudity or sexual images on Instagram” that they didn’t want to view, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，PayPal股价下跌后引发收购兴趣
item.description: 彭博新闻周一援引知情人士消息报道称，数字支付公司PayPal在股价下跌后正吸引潜在买家的收购兴趣。【原文：Digital payments company PayPal is attracting takeover interest from potential buyers after a stock slide, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 桥水公司称，2026年科技巨头将在人工智能领域投资约6500亿美元
item.description: 据桥水资产管理公司分析，美国科技巨头Alphabet、亚马逊、Meta和微软今年预计将合计投入约6500亿美元，用于扩建人工智能相关基础设施。【原文：U.S. technology giants Alphabet , Amazon , Meta and Microsoft are expected to collectively invest about $650 billion to scale up AI-related infrastructure this year, according to an analysis by Bridgewater Associates.】

item.title: 爱尔兰、芬兰等国警告勿放松欧盟并购规则
item.description: 芬兰、爱尔兰、捷克共和国以及两个波罗的海国家已对放宽欧盟并购规则发出警告。此前，部分企业呼吁放宽对其交易的监管审查，以增强与非欧盟竞争对手的竞争力。【原文：Finland, Ireland, the Czech Republic and two Baltic countries have warned against loosening EU merger rules in response to calls by some companies for easier regulatory scrutiny of their deals in order to better compete with non-EU rivals.】

item.title: 美国12月工厂订单下滑，因商用飞机订单减少
item.description: 美国工厂产品新订单在12月出现下滑，主要受商用飞机订单大幅减少影响，但其他领域需求依然强劲，部分得益于人工智能领域的强劲投资。【原文：New orders for U.S. factory goods fell in December amid a sharp decline in commercial aircraft bookings, but demand elsewhere was strong, partly driven by robust investment in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 拜耳公司就前列腺癌药物营销问题起诉强生公司
item.description: 拜耳公司周一起诉强生公司，指控这家竞争对手制药商虚假宣传一种用于治疗前列腺癌的药物。【原文：Bayer sued Johnson & Johnson on Monday, accusing the rival drugmaker of falsely advertising a drug intended to treat prostate cancer.】

item.title: 独家：沃尔沃汽车因电池起火风险召回4万辆电动SUV
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司周一告诉路透社，将召回逾4万辆旗舰电动SUV EX30，因其电池组存在过热风险。此举可能损害这家汽车制造商来之不易的安全声誉，并使其损失数百万美元。【原文：Volvo Cars will recall over 40,000 of its flagship electric EX30 SUVs because their battery packs risk overheating, it told Reuters on Monday, a move that could dent the automaker's hard-earned reputation for safety and cost it millions of dollars.】

item.title: 特朗普新15%全球关税的赢家与输家
item.description: 美国最高法院以国家紧急状态为由，撤销了特朗普总统实施的"对等"关税措施，而特朗普随后又采取行动，对全球商品征收15%的临时关税，这使世界贸易陷入新一轮混乱。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court annulment of President Donald Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs justified on national emergency grounds and Trump's subsequent move to impose a temporary 15% global tariff have thrown world trade into a new bout of confusion.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将审理埃克森美孚与太阳石油公司要求驳回博尔德市气候诉讼案的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一同意受理埃克森美孚和太阳石油公司提出的申请，该申请旨在驳回科罗拉多州博尔德市官员提起的诉讼。该诉讼要求石油公司为助长气候变化承担责任。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court agreed on Monday to hear a bid by ExxonMobil and Suncor Energy to scuttle a lawsuit brought by officials in Boulder, Colorado that seeks to hold the oil companies liable for helping to fuel climate change.】

item.title: 欧盟议员因关税风波推迟对美贸易协定投票
item.description: 欧盟议会一直在讨论取消对美国商品多项进口关税的提案。【原文：The EU assembly has been debating proposals to remove many import duties on U.S. goods.】

item.title: AMC娱乐公司票房收入超预期，影院票房持续复苏
item.description: AMC娱乐公司周一公布的第四季度营收超出华尔街预期，表明市场对影院客流量从疫情低谷缓慢回升持乐观态度。【原文：AMC Entertainment beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Monday, offering a sign of confidence in the slow recovery of cinema traffic from pandemic-era lows.】

item.title: 分析师称，诺沃农业公司CagriSema项目受挫或将使投资者关注点转向并购战略
item.description: 诺和诺德新一代减肥药CagriSema在与礼来公司Zepbound的直接对比试验中效果逊色，这对这家丹麦制药商试图在蓬勃发展的肥胖症药物市场重夺早期领先地位的努力又是一记重击。【原文：Novo Nordisk's next-generation weight-loss drug CagriSema was less effective than Eli Lilly's Zepbound in a head-to-head trial, a fresh blow to the Danish drugmaker's efforts to reclaim its early lead in the booming obesity drug market.】

item.title: IQM量子计算机公司将在美国上市，初始估值达18亿美元
item.description: 总部位于芬兰的IQM量子计算机公司周一宣布，计划通过与特殊目的收购公司Real Asset Acquisition Corp合并的方式，在美国股市上市。【原文：Finnish-headquartered IQM Quantum Computers is aiming to list its shares on the U.S. stock market via a merger with a special purpose acquisition company Real Asset Acquisition Corp , the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道：ASML揭示EUV光源技术突破，有望在2030年前提升50%芯片产量
item.description: ASML控股公司的研究人员表示，他们已找到一种方法，可提升关键芯片制造设备光源的功率，使芯片产量在本世纪末前增加50%，从而帮助这家荷兰企业保持对新兴的美国和中国竞争对手的优势。【原文：Researchers at ASML Holding say they have found a way to boost the power of the light source in a key chip making machine to turn out up to 50% more chips by decade's end, to help retain the Dutch company's edge over emerging U.S. and Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 礼来将在美国推出多剂量减肥药物装置
item.description: 礼来公司周一宣布，其减肥药物泽普邦（Zepbound）的四剂量速效笔（KwikPen）已获美国食品药品监督管理局批准上市。该装置可提供整月的治疗剂量，实现单次注射完成整月疗程。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Monday it received the U.S. Food and Drug Administration's approval to launch a four-dose KwikPen for its weight-loss drug Zepbound, delivering a full month of the treatment in a single device.】

item.title: 多米尼恩能源公司年度利润预测低于预期，上调支出计划
item.description: 多米尼能源公司周一公布的年度利润预测低于华尔街预期，但该公司将五年资本支出计划上调近30%，以加大努力满足激增的电力需求。【原文：Dominion Energy forecast annual profit below Wall Street expectations on Monday, but raised its five-year capital spending plan by nearly 30% as the utility ramps up its efforts to meet soaring electricity demand.】

item.title: OpenAI深化与咨询巨头的合作，推动企业人工智能突破试点阶段
item.description: OpenAI正通过与全球四大顶级咨询公司合作，加速进军企业市场。该公司押注更务实的合作模式，将助力企业客户突破试点项目阶段，实现人工智能的全面部署。【原文：OpenAI is expanding its push into the enterprise market by teaming up with four of the world’s largest consulting firms, betting that a more hands-on approach will help corporate clients move beyond pilot projects to full-scale AI deployments.】

item.title: 美联储委员沃勒：1月就业数据表现强劲，若此趋势延续，暂停政策调整或为明智之举
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒表示，若即将公布的2月就业数据显示美国劳动力市场在2025年疲软后已"转向更稳固的基础"，他愿意在美联储3月会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he was open to leaving interest rates on hold at the Fed's March meeting if upcoming February jobs data indicates the U.S. labor market had "pivoted to a more solid footing" after a weak 2025.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团报告称，美元已丧失部分避险货币地位
item.description: 荷兰国际集团周一在一份报告中指出，自2024年以来，美元作为避险货币的部分价值已有所减弱，但并非全部丧失。不过该机构同时表示，尚未观察到全球对美元需求的普遍恶化。【原文：The dollar has lost some, but not all, of its safe-haven value since 2024, ING said in note on Monday, adding however, that it saw no broad deterioration in global demand for the US currency.】

item.title: 吉利德将以最高78亿美元收购癌症疗法开发商Arcellx
item.description: 吉利德科学公司周一宣布，将斥资高达78亿美元收购其合作伙伴Arcellex，这是该公司自2020年以来规模最大的交易，旨在强化其抗癌药物产品线。【原文：Gilead Sciences will pay as much as $7.8 billion to acquire its partner Arcellex in its largest deal since 2020, the biopharma company said on Monday, as it looks to strengthen its lineup of cancer treatments.】

item.title: 特朗普再度抨击美国最高法院，誓言加征关税并限制许可证发放
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在最高法院上周裁定其大规模关税计划违宪后，再次谴责该法院，并誓言将动用其他关税权力和许可，但未透露具体细节。【原文：President Donald Trump renewed his condemnation of the U.S. Supreme Court after it ruled against his sweeping tariff program last week, vowing to turn to other tariff powers and licenses but giving no details.】
